doc: CodeEditor provides a simple area for viewing or editing source code snippets.

1.doc: Value contains the text, which shall be shown or edited.
1.name: Value

6.doc: InputValue is a binding to a state, into which the frontend will the user entered text. This is the pointer a State.
6.name: InputValue

7.doc: Language indicates the anticipated syntax highlighter, which shall be enabled. Defined are go, html, css, json, xml, markdown but there may be arbitrary support.
7.name: Language
